sceneDescription.title: Nero's Madness Brewing Like a Storm

setting.time: 64 AD, late afternoon, storm front approaching
setting.location: Palatine Hill, marble terrace of imperial palace
setting.weather: Dark storm clouds building, wind picking up, air pressure dropping

characters.appearance: Praetorian guard in his twenties, tense athletic build, eyes showing fear of emperor's unpredictable rage
characters.clothing: Red tunic with bronze scale armor, leather belt with gladius, bronze helmet with imperial eagle
characters.position: Standing guard at imperial palace balustrade, watching storm approach like Nero's brewing fury
characters.action: Nervous vigil as both weather and emperor's mood darken, grip tightening on sword hilt, sensing danger

scene.mainElements: Dramatic storm front with towering dark clouds, marble palace architecture with columns and carved reliefs, wind-blown vegetation
scene.details: Heavy air before rain with pressure making ears pop, first papers and leaves swirling in gusts, birds flying low seeking shelter, bronze fittings beginning to rattle, fabric banners snapping in wind, dust devils forming in courtyards, distant lightning flickering in dark clouds
scene.background: City of Rome spread below under advancing shadow of storm, aqueducts and temples becoming silhouettes, hills disappearing into dark cloud base
scene.atmosphere: Electric tension like imperial court intrigue, ominous transformation reflecting Nero's growing madness, sense of tyrannical power about to unleash destruction, dramatic contrast between civilized facade and brutal reality

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot showing figure against dramatic sky and approaching storm
composition.focus: Silhouetted guard watching massive storm front advance
composition.depth: Foreground marble architecture, middle ground figure against balustrade, background towering storm clouds and dark sky
